metadata.description: Activity-based temporal scope dataset using inherent time horizons
metadata.approach: Uses activities with natural time scales (brush teeth → minutes, graduate → years)
metadata.contrast: immediate consequences vs long-term implications of activities
metadata.design_principle: Tests conceptual understanding of temporal scope through activity contexts
metadata.examples: brush teeth→bed vs graduate→career, finish sentence→next one vs retire→new chapter
